sentences: Yip is an owner of Studio 4 Recording in Conshohocken, Pennsylvania.
Yip is also the owner of Memory Music, an independent record label he launched in June, 2015, featuring projects worked on at Studio 4.

at the Disco, Circa Survive, Code Orange, Anthony Green, Blacklisted, Title Fight, The Wonder Years, The Disco Biscuits, King Sunny Ad√©, The Fray, Keane, Balance and Composure, Superheaven, mewithoutYou, Movements, among others.
On October 8, 2013, Yip released a compilation entitled Off The Board: A Studio 4 Compilation.
